title: Born of the Ashes
description: Episode 11  A world in chaos… An eager new ally… A newly acquired ship… An even greater threat on its way…  Captain Nathan Scott must decide whether to stand and fight to the end, or live to fight another day… even if it means the end of his world.  “Born of the Ashes” is a 122,000 word novel, and is the 11th episode in The Frontiers Saga.  Episode 12 is coming soon!
author: Ryk Brown
